content: if using another method beaded rib cuff joining in the round place bor marker and begin the beaded rib pattern as follows round 1 * p2 k3 5 6 7 times p2 repeat from * to end of round round 2 * p2 k1 p1 k1 5 6 7 times p2 repeat from * to end of round repeat these 2 rounds 7 more times 8 times in all for a total of 16 rounds �3 leg rank and file panel *please note that the following pattern with rank and file stitch panel and beaded rib borders is for the front of the leg and foot only while the back and bottom are in simple stockinette stitch because of this the 4 round repeat is for the front needle first half of your stitches only while the back second half stitches are simply knit stitches and not written small size on round 1 of the first repeat only kfb in the middle of the front panel on the 13th stitch of the round and again in the middle of the back stockinette on 40th stitch of the round an increase of 2 stitches you now have 56 stitches in all medium no special instructions you remain at 64 stitches in all large on round 1 of the first repeat only k2tog in the middle of the front panel knit the 18th and 19th stitches together and again in the middle of the back stockinette knit the 55th and 56th stitches together a decrease of 2 stitches you now have 72 stitches in all round 1 p2 k3 p2 pm/sm k14 18 22 pm/sm p2 k3 p2 round 2 p2 k1 p1 k1 p2 sm *sl 2 wyb bring yf sl the same 2 sts back to lh needle and purl each of them repeat from * to marker sm p2 k1 p1 k1 p2 round 3 p2 k3 p2 sm *sl 1 wyb p1 repeat from * to marker sm p2 k3 p2 round 4 p2 k1 p1 k1 p2 sm *sl 1 wyb p1 repeat from * to marker sm p2 k1 p1 k1 p2 note please take a moment to ensure you are slipping with yarn in front or in back as specified in each round repeat this 4 round pattern another 14 times 15 times in all or to desired length of leg �4 heel flap eye of partridge beginning on ws with the last 28 32 36 stitches work heel flap back and forth as follows while keeping instep stitches - those with the pattern - on hold until it is time for the gusset row 1 sl1 wyf purl to end turn row 2 *sl1 k1 repeat from * to end turn row 3 sl1 wyf purl to end turn row 4 sl1 *sl1 k1 repeat from * to last stitch k1 turn repeat these 4 row 6 7 8 more times 7 8 9 times each for a total of 28 32 36 row
